long_description: Perfect for use with action cams and digital cameras, The Xshot Pro Camera Extender lets you get creative with your angles and makes selfies a snap for videos or photos. Includes 2 mounts: 1 for GoPro(R) cameras and 1 universal mount for almost any digital camera. 360deg precision-metal ball head captures any angle. The Xshot Pro Camera Extender features a rugged, extendable monopod design with a secure wrist strap and sturdy rubber sports grip.
short_description: Perfect for use with action cams and digital cameras, The Xshot Pro Camera Extender lets you get creative with your angles and makes selfies a snap for videos or photos.
